name: BITBREAKERS
description:
BITBREAKERS is a fast-paced real-time strategy game featuring two hackers competing over the control of a network. Explore a network of interconnected nodes, capture servers into your botnet, sniff out the enemy and take over their home server to win.


FEATURES

  • Randomly generated networks of up to 144 servers
  • 11 different operations for offense, defense and exploration
  • Adjustable AI level
  • Fast-paced matches that only take a few minutes

For Windows PCs (Windows 7 recommended)
